soccerbot

Class LightLocalizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • soccerbot.LightLocalizer

  • public class LightLocalizer
extends java.lang.Object
    LightLocalizer is in charge of using the color sensor to perform localization. This is performed after the localization of this robot using the ultrasonic sensor.

    TODO: Describe and detail light localization process.

    Author:
    Omar Akkila, Nabil Chowdhury

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      private double TILE_LENGTH 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LightLocalizer(Odometer odo, Navigation navigate, LSPoller leftCS, LSPoller rightCS, int startingCorner)
      This constructor requires the Odometer object to update its position, a Navigation object to control the motors during localization, two LSPoller objects to detect grid lines, and an integer representing the starting corner to perform the proper localization process

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void localize()
      Performs the localization process.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LightLocalizer

        public LightLocalizer(Odometer odo,
              Navigation navigate,
              LSPoller leftCS,
              LSPoller rightCS,
              int startingCorner)
        This constructor requires the Odometer object to update its position, a Navigation object to control the motors during localization, two LSPoller objects to detect grid lines, and an integer representing the starting corner to perform the proper localization process
        Parameters:
        odo - The Odometer object to be passed
        navigate - The Navigation object to be passed
        leftCS - The LSPoller object representing the left EV3 Color Sensor to be passed
        rightCS - The LSPoller object representing the right EV3 Color Sensor to be passed
        startingCorner - Integer between 1-4 representing the four corners of the field; Bottom-left = 1, Bottom-Right = 2, Top-Right = 3, Top-Left = 4

    • Method Detail

      • localize

        public void localize()
        Performs the localization process.
